name: CATAIRE (Demoware)
description:
INFORMATION

Cat + Solitaire = CATAIRE (legal gambling with cats). Purrfection graphic, You can playing CATAIRE with mouse, meow sounds and purrfect music. Cats would buy CATAIRE (if they could play). Buy it right meow!

CONTROLS

You can play on desktop (mouse, gamepad) or Your phone/tablet (the game supports touch devices).

FEATURES

- 52 Kotocards!
- No time! Only You and cats
- 94 languages supported
- Simple game and mechanics!
- Relaxing music
- High score
- 3 modes
- Support mouse or gamepad
- Beautiful graphics - Relaxing music and sound effects
- 100 Steam Achievements
- Steam Cloud
- Windows 32/64 bits, Linux 32/64 bits, Mac 32/64 bits - All resolutions (21:9, 16:9, Catwide, Ultrawide etc.) - Created by one person studio - Inspired by Microsoft Spider Solitaire

* Some features are only available in the full version (see differences below).

SUPPORT ME(ow) FULL VERSION vs DEMOWARE

The demo does not have a time limit etc. and can be played using a gamepad, but it has some limitations:

- One music theme
- No highscore (easy, medium, hard)
- One easy mode (1 suit)
- Only 13 cards
- No achievements (Steam)
- Updates
- Cats are dissatisfied (mode selection)
- DEMO (in logo, title etc.)
